response.original_title: The Oracles of God: The Story of the New Testament
response.overview: Before the Bible was bound, the truth was written.  Oracles of God explores the period following the resurrection of Jesus – when his followers began spreading his teachings, fist orally then in writing. Viewers will follow the story of how the Gospels were composed by those closest to Jesus, how letters like Paul’s were circulated among the early churches, and how early Church Fathers confirmed and preserved these sacred writings. Through expert interviews and historical reenactments, the film uncovers the evidence behind who wrote the New Testament, and when.
response.title: The Oracles of God: The Story of the New Testament
